public static long ip2Long(String ipAddress)
                    throws UnknownHostException,
                           CloudProvisioningException
Converts a standard IP address to a long-format IP address.

Parameters:

Returns:
IP address as a long value
Throws:
UnknownHostException - Indicates the given IP cannot be resolved
CloudProvisioningException - Indicates the given IP is invlaid

ipCIDR2Range

public static String ipCIDR2Range(String ipCidr)
                           throws UnknownHostException,
                                  CloudProvisioningException
Converts a CIDR IP format to an IP range format (e.g. 192.168.9.60/31 becomes 192.168.9.60 - 192.168.9.61)

Parameters:
ipCidr - IP addresses formatted as CIDR
Returns:
IP addresses formatted as a simple range
Throws:
UnknownHostException - Indicates the given IP cannot be resolved
CloudProvisioningException
